summary: Catatonia is a serious mental health condition with unusual movements and behaviors. It might start suddenly or slowly, and can be seen in different disorders like schizophrenia or mood disorders. There are different types, like being very still (akinetic) or very active (excited). If not treated, it can be dangerous. Treatments include medicines like benzodiazepines or ECT (shock therapy). Some doctors also use other medications if the first ones don't work. It's important to recognize and treat catatonia quickly.
title: Catatonia
